oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Horse-drawn haywagon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hay; Harvesting; Men; Carts & wagons; Horses; Horse teams; Meadows
Agriculture; Hay - harvesting
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two unidentified men with a team of two horses pulling a wagon of hay.
Hay is the foundation diet for livestock. Farmers rely on hay when pasture grazing is unavailable or inaccesible due to weather conditions (such as winter or drought).
